subject: Real Estate
title: AI Valuations: Better Than Appraisers?
description: A 60-second lesson on AI Valuations: Better Than Appraisers?.

hook.text: An AI model can analyze 10,000 comparable sales in seconds. A human appraiser visits three homes and guesses.

buildup.text: Automated Valuation Models analyze millions of data points: sales history, tax records, satellite imagery, and more.

twist.text: AI models inherit biases from data. Homes in minority neighborhoods are systematically undervalued by algorithms.

climax.text: AI appraisals are faster and cheaper. But they can also encode decades of discrimination into a price tag.
